H0.text: Whose portrait (apart from the Queen) appeared on the now defunct one pound note. Darwin

H1.text: Whose portrait (apart from the Queen) appeared on the now defunct one pound note. Shakespeare

H2.text: Whose portrait (apart from the Queen) appeared on the now defunct one pound note. Faraday

H3.text: Whose portrait (apart from the Queen) appeared on the now defunct one pound note. Newton's

A4.text: From 1978 until 1988, an image of Newton designed by Harry Ecclestone appeared on Series D £1 banknotes issued by the Bank of England (the last £1 notes to be issued by the Bank of England).
